include.query: SELECT DISTINCT VIEW_SETTINGS.VIEW_ID as ids FROM ENGINE.VIEW_SETTINGS AS VIEW_SETTINGS LEFT JOIN ENGINE.APPLICATION_SETTINGS APPLICATION_SETTINGS ON (VIEW_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_ID = APPLICATION_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_ID) WHERE APPLICATION_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_NAME not in ('DATACENTER','ENGINE')

SELECT DISTINCT FIELD.FIELD_ID AS ids FROM ENGINE.FIELD_SETTINGS FIELD LEFT JOIN ENGINE.FORM_FIELDS AS FORM_FIELD ON (FIELD.FIELD_ID = FORM_FIELD.FIELD_ID) LEFT JOIN ENGINE.APPLICATION_FORMS AS APPLICATION_FORMS ON (FORM_FIELD.FORM_ID = APPLICATION_FORMS.FORM_ID) LEFT JOIN ENGINE.APPLICATION_SETTINGS AS PARENT_FORMS ON (APPLICATION_FORMS.APPLICATION_ID = PARENT_FORMS.APPLICATION_ID) WHERE FIELD.FIELD_ID >0 AND PARENT_FORMS.APPLICATION_NAME NOT IN ('DATACENTER','ENGINE')

SELECT DISTINCT FIELD.FIELD_ID AS ids FROM ENGINE.FIELD_SETTINGS FIELD LEFT JOIN ENGINE.FORM_FIELDS AS FORM_FIELD ON (FIELD.FIELD_ID = FORM_FIELD.FIELD_ID) LEFT JOIN ENGINE.APPLICATION_FORMS AS APPLICATION_FORMS ON (FORM_FIELD.FORM_ID = APPLICATION_FORMS.FORM_ID) LEFT JOIN ENGINE.APPLICATION_SETTINGS AS PARENT_FORMS ON (APPLICATION_FORMS.APPLICATION_ID = PARENT_FORMS.APPLICATION_ID) WHERE FIELD.FIELD_ID >0 AND PARENT_FORMS.APPLICATION_NAME NOT IN ('DATACENTER','ENGINE')

SELECT DISTINCT VIEW_SETTINGS.VIEW_ID as ids FROM ENGINE.VIEW_SETTINGS AS VIEW_SETTINGS LEFT JOIN ENGINE.APPLICATION_SETTINGS APPLICATION_SETTINGS ON (VIEW_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_ID = APPLICATION_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_ID) WHERE APPLICATION_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_NAME not in ('DATACENTER','ENGINE')

SELECT DISTINCT VIEW_SETTINGS.VIEW_ID as ids FROM ENGINE.VIEW_SETTINGS AS VIEW_SETTINGS LEFT JOIN ENGINE.APPLICATION_SETTINGS APPLICATION_SETTINGS ON (VIEW_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_ID = APPLICATION_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_ID) WHERE APPLICATION_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_NAME not in ('DATACENTER','ENGINE')

SELECT DISTINCT VIEW_SETTINGS.VIEW_ID as ids FROM ENGINE.VIEW_SETTINGS AS VIEW_SETTINGS LEFT JOIN ENGINE.APPLICATION_SETTINGS APPLICATION_SETTINGS ON (VIEW_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_ID = APPLICATION_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_ID) WHERE APPLICATION_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_NAME not in ('DATACENTER','ENGINE')

SELECT DISTINCT VIEW_SETTINGS.VIEW_ID as ids FROM ENGINE.VIEW_SETTINGS AS VIEW_SETTINGS LEFT JOIN ENGINE.APPLICATION_SETTINGS APPLICATION_SETTINGS ON (VIEW_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_ID = APPLICATION_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_ID) WHERE APPLICATION_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_NAME not in ('DATACENTER','ENGINE')

SELECT DISTINCT VIEW_SETTINGS.VIEW_ID as ids FROM ENGINE.VIEW_SETTINGS AS VIEW_SETTINGS LEFT JOIN ENGINE.APPLICATION_SETTINGS APPLICATION_SETTINGS ON (VIEW_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_ID = APPLICATION_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_ID) WHERE APPLICATION_SETTINGS.APPLICATION_NAME not in ('DATACENTER','ENGINE')
